author: Amy Cheng, Andrew Jeong
title: Russia-Ukraine live updates: Kyiv, other cities under fierce bombardment as Moscow ramps up ‘indiscriminate’ assault
description: Satellite imagery shows that parts of a town near Kyiv have been leveled, as Western officials warned of a possible chemical attack on Ukraine by Russia.
content: The United States and the European Union announced bans on luxury exports to Russia on Friday, as part of a growing effort to levy economic penalties on Vladimir Putin and other Russian leaders for i… [+1238 chars]
